mapper.select:
SELECT a.id,a.name,(CASE WHEN a.profilePhoto IS NULL THEN '' ELSE a.profilePhoto END) AS profilePhoto FROM maUser AS a
a.idMaCompany = #{idMaCompany} AND a.idMaOrgnization = #{idMaOrgnization} AND a.tag = 'n' AND a.status = 'e'
AND a.codeMaRole IN ('em','le')
AND a.codeMaRole = #{codeMaRole}
ORDER BY a.id ASC

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(DISTINCT CONCAT(' ', od.name) ORDER BY dc.idOpDevice) groupDeviceCode, mu.* FROM maUser mu LEFT JOIN opDeviceElectricianCard dc ON dc.idElectrician = mu.id LEFT JOIN opDevice od ON od.id = dc.idOpDevice WHERE dc.idOpDeviceGroup = #{idOpDeviceGroup} GROUP BY mu.id;

SELECT DISTINCT mu.*, ow.id idOpWorkOrder, ow.name nameOpWorkOrder FROM opWorkOrder ow LEFT JOIN opWorkOrderCard oc ON oc.idOpWorkOrder = ow.id LEFT JOIN maUser mu ON mu.id = oc.idLeader WHERE oc.midOpWorkOrder = #{midOpWorkOrder} AND mu.id IS NOT NULL GROUP BY mu.id;
